German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Zigarette
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French cigarette.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌtsi(ː).ɡaˈʁɛ.tə/ (standard)
  • IPA(key): /tsɪɐ̯ˈʁɛ.tə/ (casual speech; chiefly northern and central Germany)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Zigarette f (genitive Zigarette, plural Zigaretten, diminutive Zigarettchen n)

  1. cigarette
